as much as i absolutely hate his slow, he needs it to be even semi decent

Yes and no. He needs the CC to land his damage. However, turning enemy ADC into a limp noodle meanwhile is simply not necessary. He can force the 1v1 (I guess), but at least let the guy fight back.

The defense against him is basically to wait out his overwhelming ultimate buffs or magically CC him down as a 5-man. His counterplay to that is to pick a unit and make them helpless to be picked off. However, to make that unit utterly useless meanwhile is not necessary, especially without possibility of dodging it.

Either the attack speed cripple needs to go, or that slow needs to lose a little of its bite. It does not need to be that strong, especially since CDR is core on him already. The downtime ends up being maybe 1.6 seconds, almost down to 1 second with Cosmic Insight.

He's supposed to be a snowball-reliant champ. With Wither's power, it requires a team effort to keep that from happening unless directly countered, and even then, he can farm under tower plenty safely with ease.

His ultimate already gives damage resistance in the form of ever growing resistances and I believe there's already enough tenacity in the game to help him.  You have legend tenacity, unflinching, steraks, and even merc treds.   

This buff is simply to help him as he needs it.  Plenty of counters currently and fails to function entirely the higher you go.  Ever see what it's like to go against any other juggernaut currently or even bruisers top as Nasus?  It's just overly strenuous and difficult.
More people need to hear this. I got downvoted to hell on another post when I tried to explain why this buff helps nasus.

I can agree he needs help... but Nasus is largely into stacking that Q, and straight up doubling it means you can see 40 min Nasus (world breaker) near 20 mins! That's INSANE.

If they buffed him, id expect 6-->8 or 6-->9 not 6-->(6*2)!!!

And again, going back to the general argument, there's already a LOT of damage. 

Imagine you playing a bruiser for damage and tankiness... but by 20 mins he IS that, just with no gap closer except maybe a flash. if someone picks you or he somehow gets to you, its over. At 25-30 mins......

It's not doubling most of his stacking, only what used to be his +6 stacks, so cannons and champs and towers, that kind of thing. Most of his stacking will probably still come from regular minions which still give +3

Which means that if Nasus finds his fodder quickly, *he can farm champs down and become stronger even faster*. This should not be intended. If he really needs more food, it needs to be in modest gameplay, not dependent on his champ-mowing snowball.
